name: framingham-app-Hooks
description: This is a SMART-enabled and CDS Hooks-enabled template for the Framingham Risk Calculator in the FHIR Education package. Risk equations come from https://www.mdcalc.com/framingham-risk-score-hard-coronary-heart-disease#evidence. Docker/Node/Hooks server file architecture adapted from https://github.com/cerner/cds-services-tutorial/wiki
author: Stratametrics LLC
